name: Searching for objects in the forest
name_original: Searching for objects in the forest
description:
Searching for objects in the forest is a classic game in the genre of "I'm looking for".
During the game, you will have to get acquainted and search various places.
The game contains 4 different levels. There are also hints in the game that will help you find even the most hidden objects.
The game is great for children, develops dexterity and attentiveness!
If you like to search for hidden objects, then this game is created for you!
